casebody.data:
John DOE (a pseudonym)
v.
I.D. CONSULTANTS, P.A. & Infusion Care Specialists, Philip C. Lackey, M.D., and Denise (last name unknown). No. 520P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2006. David W. McDonald, for John Doe. Norman F. Klick, Jr., Greensboro, for I.D. Consultants, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 27th day of September 2006 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th day of September 2006."
